## Lendo os arquivos de entrada do trabalho

Inicialmente iremos carregar os dois arquivos de entrada do trabalho.

#### imc_20162

``` {r echo=TRUE}
imc_data <- read.csv(file = './imc_20162.csv')
summary(imc_data)
```

``` {r echo=TRUE}
imc_data <- read.csv(file = './CS01_20172.csv', sep =";")
summary(imc_data)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
